Manx: Thomaase : "As t'ou ginsh dou, nagh daag eh argid erbee ny-yei?"
English: Thomas : "And you tell me that he has left no money?"

Manx: Juan: "Cha daag. Ta'n skeeal myr shoh : Chaill eh e laynt geddyn e verçhys, eisht chaill eh e verçhys shirrey dy gheddyn reesht e laynt."
English: John : "None. This is what they say: He lost his health getting rich, and then he lost his riches trying to get his health back."
